value: content=Taxi boat on the island green, departure bay Nessadiou or the nautical base of La Roche Percee. Round trip on the Green Island: 2500 CFP per person, 1500 CFP for children 3 to 10 years.Output discovered in the lagoon on request.
content=ocated in the heart of the village. Completed in 1878, the church was then owned by the prison administration. It has often been damaged by the hurricanes
name=Chapel of Our Lady of Bon Secours
directions=located at the southern entrance of the village
price=250 CFP, Guided tour of the built heritage of the town: 3000 CFP for 1-10 people (bring your own vehicle

content=You will discover the history of the town Bourail and New Caledonia; Petroglyphs, Kanak through agricultural establishment criminal law, the sash, the Arabic presence in New Zealand or the agricultural shows. Guided tour of the built heritage of the town on booking two tours; either of the historical buildings or the position of the sea and the lighthouse Gouaro.

content=Scuba diving outfit run by Olivier Jullien; first diving accessible to all: 6000 CFP; Form Exploration (2 dives for certified divers): 12000 CFP, Training Level 1: 28 000 CFP. Go to the nautical base of La Roche 7:30AM, return around 13PM. Materials included. Children from 12 years.

content=Scuba shop run by Erick Richard. Output discovery of the lagoon by boat: Minimum 3 people, go to 9:00 at the naval base of La Roche, back for 14 h; Picnic on the green island, discovering the fauna and flora of the lagoon Bourail.6300 CFP pax or 3150 CFP for children Fishing: all equipment is provided. Activity suitable for both novice fisherman that experienced. Affiliated with the Federation of Sport Fishing. Some fish may be kept (see charter sport fishing). Species in the area of fishing: tuna, bonito, wahoo, swordfish ... Rates on appeal. Billing lures and equipment damaged.

content=Out Eco-discovery: (minimum 4 persons) with guided tour boating discovery part of the lagoon of the West Coast Area World Heritage Site. Check 8:00 - Back noon. Two options with or without meals (meals back to surf camp). This eco-tour takes you from the mangroves of the river Nera, with discovery of false passes of large reef (diving fins, mask, snorkel) through the green island, the beach of Roche breakthrough, the man, the Bay turtles and the rocky coast.  Places loaded with myths and legends that Manu will tell you with pleasure. Immersion in the natural environment with a very high dose nature with educational awareness on the protection of sea turtles. Also offers surfing and lessons, bodyboard, taxi boat, Taxi surfing and fishing trips.
directions=in front of the mutual officials Poe

content=School kitesurfing labeled FFVL. Lessons, workshops and kite rentals on the most beautiful lagoon from the mainland, lake shallow (1m) ideal for learning. Certified instructor since 2004. Max 3 students per class.
name=Centre Nautique et d'Activités MD Plaisirs
directions=base at the entrance to the campground Poe
content=Windsurfing courses and equipment hire to the half-hour (rates). Catamaran, kayak and bicycle hire.
directions=located after the site of Poe
content=Rent a kayak (1100 CFP / h simply, 2000 CFP/h double), windsurfing (2200 CFP/h), fun board (2500 CFP/h), Catamaran Hobie Cat 14 (3800 CFP / h), PPW (5000 CFP half-hour).

content=Give yourself 30 minutes flying Bourail exceptional para-engine two-seater,5000 CFP baptism. Flights to map depending on what you want to discover. Leaving Poe morning at sunrise, depending on climatic conditions. Overview of Poe, lagoon, La Roche, Delta Nera of Nessadiou.
content=Flying school plane and ULM. Aerial rides, a 2-seater plane and another 3-4 seats. Call for prices of flights.

content=Horse riding by the hour (minimum 2 pax), day (minimum 4 people) or weekend (minimum 8 people). Maximum 14 people. Children from 10 years with experience. Scenic walks in forests and mountains, magnificent views over the lagoon overnight in guesthouse located in the mountain. Meals provided. Call for rates.

content=Rusa deer hunting; 5000 CFP for the hunting guide per day, 20 000 CFP without a trophy deer, 45 000 CFP deer with trophy (July–September). Visit the breeding station (1000 CFP), night visit with observation of deer (1000 CFP) hiking and stunning views on the delta of the Nera (500 CFP), Activity skeet shooting (2500 CFP 25 shots), Rent a canoe (500CFP/h)

content=Classes in weaving, 2000 CFP during the two hours per person, 1 to 6 people, materials provided, weaving coconut leaf or pandanus. The Saturday morning in the market Bourail.  Weaving workshop closed on Saturday and Sunday. Exhibition and sale of baskets in The Information centre (Point I) of Bourail.
, Tribe Gouaro 9 km from the village
The Turtle Bay and The Bay of Love
The range of the Roche Percee
Beach and La Pointe Nessadiou vidoir
directions=access on the left before the 3rd retarder

content=40 min, 2 km loop, quick tour through an ecosystem that is very special dry forest (natural site), family relaxing walk, great variety of endemic plants, labeling botany, exploring the mangrove and dense shade. Mosquitoes during the hot season!

content=Starting at the beginning of the beach of Roche Percee, 2h30 walking, 4.2 km round-trip trail to vegetation and unique landscapes, which starts at the Bay of Roche Percee, soars Belvedere, across the bay of turtles famous for its beautiful pine columnar and gives access to the bay of love. Course slippery in wet weather. Provide closed shoes.
content=Has for the last four years been the nesting site for turtles

. There was the 2009-2010 season, more than 250 nests, a fifty turtles came to lay. The site is the second biggest in the Pacific. Eco-guards Bwari are volunteers who work morning and evening throughout the period of laying and hatching, which is from November to April. They identify, count, write scientific observations and protect turtle nests through the introduction of cages.  To participate in this round of awareness and turtle wat, a financial contribution will be required. You can also buy a t-shirt.
content=Nathalie Ruffian, snack in front of the mutual officials Poe. Kayaks on Wednesday, Thursday and Friday from 9:30AM-2:30PM and weekends, school holidays and public holidays from 8AM to 17:30.

content=Eugene and Gabriel Hernu, after the bridge over the Nera. Caledonian and French cuisine, room 80. Terrace (capacity 30 people) with river views. 60 specialties of seafood and meats. Great variety of local dishes: home-made sausages, skewers of shrimp, crab with garlic and parsley, small saucepan sea coconut curry pork, tripe à la mode Bourail, cassoulet. house hotel, swimming pool, various activities.

content=Teresa, Guy and Sylvie Stangalino La Roche Percee, el.kantara @ lagoon.nc. Caledonian and French cuisine, service on the terrace and lunch room in the evening, menu: salads, beef, shrimp, chocolate mousse and caramel cream house. Open for breakfast and dinner, closed Sunday. Breakfast from 6:00. Bar. Pool.Hotel.

content=Opposite the market Bourail. Breakfast from 8:30AM, lunch: daily menu card, the evening card, oysters and seafood platter all year, beef, nice variety of salads, assorted desserts varied. Closed Sunday evening.
content=The village, Specialties of all types, main course, dessert and snack variety, open for lunch. Wifi.
content=Camping Poe. Breakfast, lunchtime and evening meals daily, on-site or off the ice, tea, coffee, children's menu.
content=Opposite the mutual officials Poe. Steak fries, panini, smoothies, main course, croque-monsieur, salads, quiche, sausage and chips. Closed Monday and Tuesday.
content=In the village center on the site Blidy, paninis, burgers, hot dogs, chips, kebab.

content=La Roche Percée, Waffles, pancakes, sweet and savory, milkshake, ice cream, coffee, beverages, open from Wednesday to Sunday from 8h to 18h in summer and from 8:30 to 17PM during the winter. During school holidays, closed Tuesday.

content=The village, next to City Hall, tél : (00687) 81 75 85, Pizza, burgers, hot dogs, pasta, salads, sandwiches, on or off the premises. Open Monday to Saturday from 10:30AM-1:30PM for snacks and from 16:30 to 21h for pizza.

content=Marion and Philippe Sbinné, Néméara. Preferably by appointment, open all year. Alsatian cuisine and family: cheese, potatoes, grilled sausages, liver dumplings, baeckeoffe, braised ham, breaded pork feet. Special Events pie outbreak, pizzas from the wood: 3150 CFP incl, (drink, meal at will, dessert, coffee). Child: 1575 CFP incl. Sauerkraut: 4500 CFP, baeckeoffe: 4000 CFP. Possibility of birthday meal. Max. 20 persons.

content=Vivian and Edmond Richard Poe. On reservation, open all year, lunch and dinner. Menus poultry, deer or seafood. 3000 CFP menu (starter, main course, dessert). Seafood platter at 6000 CFP (oysters, shrimp, mussels, fish salad, salad trochus, crab). Children's menu at 2000 CFP. Breakfast: buffet 1500 CFP. Maximum 60 persons.
, Stephanie and Manu La Roche Percee, tel: (00687) 43 23 26- (00687)78 40 26, info@nekweta.com

.  Open to all reservation. Set in a tropical garden, enjoy a relaxing round a fireplace built into the deck by deck, before enjoying a cuisine based on fresh local products. Menu meat (venison, beef, pork or poultry) or Menu exotic fish (yellowfin tuna, parrot ...) by supply. 3150 CFP dinner (appetizer, main course and dessert).  2415 CFP lunch (main course, dessert).  1050 CFP breakfast.  Half price for children 3 to 10 years.
Denise Velayoudon, tél : (00687)44 13 36, covered market on the outskirts of town, every Saturday morning, fruit and seasonal vegetables, honey, syrups, jams, cakes, dishes, flowers, plants.
content=René Ménéoumé, Every 1 st Sunday of each month from 8AM-12PM, fruit and vegetables in season, jams, coffee, honey, syrups, cakes, meals, tour of the cave Oua Oué.

content=Association of Women Table Unio, 3rd Saturday of every month from 8AM-16PM, agricultural region, food, workshop weaving, traditional cooking workshop (preparation of Mwata example), 2 guided hikes held that day, 500 CFP for participation by people for workshops and tours. Local produce farmers network Welcome to the Farm

content=Karine and Augustus Barretteau, Nessadiou, farm sales, delivery possible, venison sausage, smoked sausage, fresh sausage, merguez, chipolata, smoked deer ham, egg, Pickled. Poteaux de gaïac sculptés. Posts guaiac carved.
content=Mylène Aifa, Boghen, Field of organic yams, selling products from August to December, picnic area beside the river.
content=Paulette Guillaume, Nandaï., jams, syrups, fruit jellies, honey, cakes and quiches. Thursday to the city center, to Wednesday passion Cove vata, the market Farino and Agricultural Fairs.

price=Holiday cottage implanted in a luxuriant tropical garden, two minutes on foot from the beach, the personalized site full of charm with one bure in Melanesian style, one bungalow, two guest houses, one big faré bar and restaurant. Rates : Bure: 10 150 F (2 p), 11 650 F (3 p), 12 950 F (4, 5, 6 p), bungalow: 5 150 F (2 p), room: 5,150 F (2 p), 6,150 F (3 p). Meal: 3,150 F dinner, 1,050 F breakfast, 2,415 F lunch, 6,300 F full board. Package eco-discovered (four persons mini): accommodation in bure, dinner, breakfast, trip by boat in the lagoon on ½ a day and lunch: 14,200 F.

price=Three rooms of a capacity of three persons and two rooms of five persons. 6,300 F TTC the room for 2 persons with breakfast, 1,350 F additional person (675 F for children until ten years), tapering rate weekly and for the month. Wi-Fi.

price=Two wooden cottages for an accommodation facilities of thre and four persons, common kitchen and toilets, table, chairs and privative barbecue in every cottage, 6,000 F for three persons, 8,000 F for four persons. Pedestrian trek and bathing in the river. Sets for the children (swings, slide).

content=Natural, shaded, maximum area of campsite 30 persons. Toilet block with warm water. 500 F by tent and 500 F by person. Room in a guest house in the house: 6 000 F the overnight stay. Meal. Beach in 200 m.

price=Vast shaded area of campsite situated along the beach of Poé, tent sea side: 1 500 F by night + 150 F / pers, tent in hiding side: 1 000 F by night + 150 F / pers. 7 not fitted cottages side beach 2 800 F / night + 150 F / pers, 2 mobile homes 6 000 F by night bases pers 4. Toilets, barbecue, snack bar and grocer's shop. Boating center and boat with bottom in glass

price=Accommodation at the inhabitant in a garden full of charm, in the peace, near the beach of La Roche Percée (The Leaky Rock). 1 room with double bed ( 6 300 F TTC), 1 room with 1 double bed and 2 bunk beds ( 8 400 F TTC), 1 room with 3 single beds ( 7 350 F TTC). Kitchen  area under a faré. Dinner and  breakfast available with reservation. Wi-Fi.

price=Accommodation in room situated in about twenty km in the North of Bourail after the Bridge of Le Cap, the panel on the left by coming from the village. Independent building between the forest and the river, two rooms with 2 single beds, in one of the rooms there is a kitchen. Ventilator, shower with warm water, washbasin, toilets to part. Terrace covered with chairs and table. Supplied sheets. Campsite authorized for additional persons. Breakfast : 600 F. Meal in the demand on reservation. Room in a guest house: 4 950 F on the base 2 pers. Holiday cottage  (room and meal): 7 450 F base 2 pers. Tapering rate weekly.

price=Natural area of campsite situated in a tribe between the church of Oua Oué and the Common house, sanitary Hall (toilets and shower), Common house available and big faré, 500 F / Adult / day, 200 F for child under 10 years.

price=Property by the sea situated in 24 km in the North of Bourail, Only with  4x4 in times of rain, 3 huts of a capacity of 5 persons each with a view of the sea, 2 chalets of a capacity of 3 persons, 10 500 F HT by hut on night, equipped kitchen, kit to have breakfast supplied. Meal available, 3800 F the complete meal with aperitif and wine. Price excluding tax.

price=Wooden cottage for 4 persons, situated in forest, in 1, 7 km of the house of the owners, in river bank, kitchen, refrigerator, barbecue, toilets with warm water, supplied sheets. Rate: 8000 F a day for 4 persons. Possibility of putting up tent : 1000 F / additional person. Rates excluding tax. Meal available on demand.

price=A beautiful four-bedroomed house situated after the tribe of Gouaro a few minutes away from the beach of Poé. Completely furnished villa, being able to accommodate up to 12 persons. Panoramic teak terrace of 80 square meters. Magnificent sight on the lagoon. Peace and quietness insured. Deposit asked for the reservation. Rates  following the number of persons and the duration of the stay.Rate on this website: www.gitesnouvellecaledonie.nc

price=Complex situated in the North of the village behind the cinema. 3 rooms which can accommodate from 2 to 3 persons (refrigerator, TV, air conditioning), 1 studio for 2 persons (quite equipped) and 2 apartments up to 5 persons, quite equipped. Rate TTC (from October till April): 7000 F HT by room bases 2 persons, 1000 F by additional person, 8 000 F HT for the studio, 9000 F HT the apartment. There is also a rate in the month.

price=Complex was situated between the beach and the river, 20 rooms which can accommodate from 2 to 4 persons ( 14 air-conditioned), toilets in every room (shower, toilets),  rate  bases 2 persons: 6 800 F with the air conditioning, 6 000 F with ceiling fan. Swimming pool and restaurant.

price=Establishment situated in river bank Néra (8 rooms  air-conditioned with TV, toilets and shower-room, terrace), 1 suite moon honey river, swimming pool, swing, trampoline, paying activities on reservation (canoes, visit of the property of bovine breeding, night-visit of stags, trapshooting, hunting, trek).  Picnic basket available. Rate brings to room temperature base 2 persons: 7 650 F TTC.

content=Three wooden cottages which can accommodate 6, 8 and 12 persons each. 8 000 F for 2 persons, 
3 000 F by additional adult, child - 12 years: 1 000 F, free for - 3 years. Air conditioned. Fitted kitchen area.  A cot in every chalet.  Beach in 200 m. Cooked meats (brochette, chipolata).

content=Two wooden cottages for 4 maxi persons with toilets (washbasin, WC and shower), a double bed and two single beds. Basic rate for 4 persons 8 400 F the overnight stay. 2 guest houses with double bed and a room with 5 beds : 2 100 F the overnight stay by pers. Meal: complete menu: 2 100 F, breakfast :800 F. Special meals and seafoods. Contact Isabelle to have the detail of rates.

content=Call up at least 2 days before.
Area of campsite around the Common house. Toilet block, faré. In the week, dinner, campsite, breakfast: 4 000 F by pers. The weekend, from Friday 4PM till Sunday 11AM, the meals and breakfasts, campsite: 7 000 F by pers. Half-price for the children under 12 years. Trek on the lands of the tribe with guide, 500 F by pers.

Glass bottom boat, 
2000 CFP per person, half price for children, based on 4 people minimum, 15 people max. 
Beautiful output available to all and everyone. 
Remember to take your fins, mask and snorkel.
